text: Āllāhē kērala siham̐tara lagata bandhutba karaibalai niṣēdha karaichē, yisakalē dbīna samparkē tōmālōkara biraud'dhē yud'dha karaichē, tōmālōkaka sbadēśara paraā bahiṣkāra karaichē ārau tōmālōkaka bahiṣkāra karaibalai sahāẏa karaichē. Siham̐tara lagata yiham̐tē bandhutba karaē siham̐tē'i yālima
